content.json:
# Operational Overview

Real-time operational health across infrastructure and applications. Click any row to drill down.

---

content.query: Heartbeat | where TimeGenerated > ago({TimeRange:value}) | summarize LastHeartbeat = max(TimeGenerated) by Computer, OSType | extend Status = case(LastHeartbeat > ago(5m), "Online", LastHeartbeat > ago(15m), "Warning", "Offline") | summarize Online = countif(Status == "Online"), Warning = countif(Status == "Warning"), Offline = countif(Status == "Offline") | extend Total = Online + Warning + Offline
content.title: System Status Summary

content.query: Heartbeat | where TimeGenerated > ago({TimeRange:value}) | summarize LastHeartbeat = max(TimeGenerated) by Computer, OSType | extend Status = case(LastHeartbeat > ago(5m), "Online", LastHeartbeat > ago(15m), "Warning", "Offline") | order by Status desc, Computer asc
content.title: System Status Detail

content.query: Perf | where TimeGenerated > ago({TimeRange:value}) | where Computer == '{SelectedComputer}' or '{SelectedComputer}' == '' | where ObjectName has 'processor' and CounterName has 'processor time' and InstanceName has 'total' | summarize AvgCPU = avg(CounterValue), MaxCPU = max(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m) | order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: CPU Trend
